implementations.notes: Synthetic file created from patient contacts.

implementations.lag: Monthly data has a 1 month lag; Yearly data has up to 18 months lag.
implementations.notes: MN DOH death reports obtained on both monthly and yearly basis.
The vast majority of records have dates from 1993 to present. Less thatn 1% have loc_start prior to 1993, stretching back to 1896.
Only Tobacco History is availble prior to 2005, and is sourced differently than 2005 forward.

implementations.lag: External utilization is sourced from claims and may have up to a 90-day lag.
implementations.notes: Data prior to 2005 is from a legacy source and may not be classifed as cleanrly as 2005 forward.

Providers prior to the NPI registry (or not on the registry) are available - registry dates are null.

implementations.lag: External utilization is sourced from claims and may have up to a 90-day lag.
implementations.notes: Data prior to 2005 is from a legacy source and may not be classifed as cleanrly as 2005 forward.
These come exclusively from State death certificates.

implementations.lag: 2 years for State DOH data, much less for e.g., hospital discharges, etc.

implementations.notes: Only available for tumors diagnosed in the 17 counties surrounding the Puget Sound.
